title: LEGIT: can I AP (FULL) lucian support?
body: I only  play normals and adc champs only. Now this game, I get support role; Can I go full AP lucian and feed + troll my team for 40+mins?

replies.body: Within the rules of the game, you CAN go ap Lucian support. You CANNOT feed and troll your team.
Pretty much this. It goes under the rule of "don't be an ass" :P
You "can" do whatever you like. The better question is "should" you do that
